DataElement.preferredName: Trastuzumab Agent Second Dose Administered Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date the second dose or amount of trastuzumab, a humanized recombinant monoclonal antibody directed against the HER2- receptor protein, administered.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the second dose or amount of trastuzumab, a humanized recombinant monoclonal antibody directed against the HER2- receptor protein, being administered.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A humanized recombinant monoclonal antibody directed against the HER2- receptor protein.  Trastuzumab binds to the extracellular domain of the growth factor protein HER2, thereby inhibiting proliferation of HER2 overexpressing tumor cells.  Binding with HER2 protein also initiates an antibody-dependent cell cytotoxicity.(NCI):An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: A recombinant humanized monoclonal antibody directed against the human epidermal growth factor receptor 2 (HER2). After binding to HER2 on the tumor cell surface, trastuzumab induces an antibody-dependent cell-mediated cytotoxicity against tumor cells that overexpress HER2. HER2 is overexpressed by many adenocarcinomas, particularly breast adenocarcinomas. (NCI04)
An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.

Property.preferredDefinition: Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude.:The amount of medicine taken, or radiation given, at one time.:Given.

Concepts.definition: Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
